website_summaries.verdict: Whether you are looking for shoes for everyday wear, work, or semi-dressy events, these oxfords are worth considering for their good looks and comfort.
pros: Men who own these oxfords rave about their minimalist good looks, several available color options, and flexible rubber sole that generates comfortable wear
cons: The fit is somewhat tight on some men, especially in the toe area

customer_reviews.title: I had a bad experience with this kind
customer_reviews.text: I have a bad experience with this kind. I generally wear Aldo shoes. I bought two pairs of this kind of Aldo shoes, I wear one pair for about 8days. The bottom part completely felt off or completely disassembled from the shoes. I was at work went the issue happened. I had to leave work I went to a shoe store near my job and found something to wear. I generally like Aldo’s, but I was not lucky this time. I believe Aldo can do a better job in manufacturing this shoe kind.
customer_reviews.author: Wade Rateau

customer_reviews.title: Good looking shoes, a lil bit tight
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are very good looking, only that are a lil bit tight, i use them with thin socks
customer_reviews.author: Gustavo Rojas

customer_reviews.title: Cool color and stylish shoe. Order 1/2 size mire.
customer_reviews.text: The size which I got was too tight. I ordered the same size as other aldo shoes I wear. The look and feel of the shoe is very cool and stylish.
customer_reviews.author: LN

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: They didn't have these at the aldo stores in Chicago yet (brand new model), but they are fantastic and they came in a couple days and in time for my Hawaiian vacation!
customer_reviews.author: Ares6X

customer_reviews.title: It is a great shoe, just one size too small
customer_reviews.text: It is a great shoe, just one size too small. Good thing i knew about it because I've tried it on in the store before so i ordered the right size.
customer_reviews.author: Bearded Superman

customer_reviews.title: Great look & fit
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves these shoes. Nice enough for work and comfortable for the walking commute.
customer_reviews.author: Angelina

customer_reviews.title: Fits WAY too tight
customer_reviews.text: Nice shoe, but the size 13 fit isn't even close. It's so small that the only logical explanation is that they must've put the wrong label on the tongue. If you want to risk it, get a size bigger. If you're a size 13, don't waste your time.
customer_reviews.author: Erik Knoedler

customer_reviews.title: Would Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality. The leather on the shoe is nice and soft while still retaining shape. It is the best fitting shoe I have owned in quite some time. I would recommend, but be warned you'll need to clean them pretty regularly if you want them to stay looking nice, (as with most shoes).
customer_reviews.author: luke perry

customer_reviews.title: If you have a 6.5 you will fit in the size 7
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe. A size 6.5 will fit into a size 7 with a thick socks..
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea D.

customer_reviews.title: Nice Look , terrible quality
customer_reviews.text: These shoes fit nothing like Aldo shoes I've bought in the past. Feels like I'm walking on a piece of rubber. No comfort and too small which leads me to think they are fake.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: The pair arrived in time is just not the size ...
customer_reviews.text: The pair arrived in time is just not the size what I selected. I order 13 and the pair is 12
customer_reviews.author: Cristian Vasile

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable But Stick With Your Shoe Size
customer_reviews.text: me personally I'm a skinny tall guy and so my feet are the same way skinny and sort of long. I'm usually a 9 but I thought an 8 would be fine. Boy was I wrong. I switched to a 9 and it was so much better. still great shoe
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: after breaking them in they fit fine. The shoes look great for the price
customer_reviews.text: The shoes were somewhat small, making it uncomfortable to wear on the first day. However, after breaking them in they fit fine. The shoes look great for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Loved these shoes. Great quality and fits just right. I would buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: Luis Alanis

customer_reviews.title: Great looking shoes!
customer_reviews.text: As branded, they are a great pair of shoes. Comfortable and trendy!
customer_reviews.author: Sai

customer_reviews.title: Nice Shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable shoe, looks very nice, so far so good. .
customer_reviews.author: Daniel B

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is awesome! I love it. Exactly what I expected and more!
customer_reviews.author: PR18

customer_reviews.title: The shoes looked great and my husband loved them
customer_reviews.text: The shoes looked great and my husband loved them...however they were too small. He has other also shoes that are size 11 but these ones were just too small. We had to return them and got a size bigger...we'll see when he wear them...so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great and comfortable shoes, TERRIBLE LACES!!!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are comfortable, great if you are walking for long periods of the day as you don't feel much pressure on your feet. However, the laces are probably the worse quality I've ever seen. It took just 1 month and a half for the laces to come apart. Already had them replaced.
customer_reviews.author: domingo perez

product_meta.title: ALDO Men's Aauwen R Fashion Sneaker
